name: 创世神
abstract: 【2021Pico年度最佳沙盒内容】化身创世神，创造你自己的世界

detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Spanish, Korean, French, German, Dutch, Thai, Italian, Portuguese, Polish
detail.app_release_note:
Added a new civilization : The Pirates
Cities can now build harbours
harbours can now build trade ships or pirates ships
Trade ships exchange resources between all cities with an harbour
Pirates ships plunder trade ships
New miracle : Maelstrom
New miracle : Pirates Den
Terrains are now blending with each other. This will allow us to add terrain with different colors in future updates.
Better coasts
Better docks
Better farms
Better lava
Added a tooltip to both controller to display information about object touched by the player
Added tooltip information for all miracles
Added a message above the needed resource when that resource must be imported from another civilization (ex : weapons, jewels, tools,...)
Backward smooth movement is now working properly
Increased smooth rotation speed
Added various soldiers models to better fit their civilization and technology level
Added various heirs models to better fit their civilization and technology level
Added bhaptcis support
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo2, PICO Neo3, PICO Neo2 Lite, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro, PICO Neo2 Wigig, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4 Ultra
